h2_title: Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter
content: Boar Bajie has a lot of wide swinging attacks to be wary of, often shifting his body weight to slam his head to the side or swing it upwards.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Zhu_Bajie_(Boss_Fight).md', within the main section titled 'Zhu Bajie (Boss Fight)', specifically from the subsection 'Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter'.
The content is as follows:
Boar Bajie has a lot of wide swinging attacks to be wary of, often shifting his body weight to slam his head to the side or swing it upwards.
